title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 4 fun crypto coins up for grabs! LOT 1: 2012 Casascius 1btc brass blankLOT 2: 2012 Casascius 5 btc nickel blankLOT 3: 2014 CryptoImperator 10,000 Doge redeemedLOT 4: 2015 Shibanu 50,000 Doge DIY*LOT 4 will come with official Shiabnu hologramSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0002BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 4th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
